column1: Although #SmallBizSat looks a little bit different this year there has never been a more important time to support your community’s local small businesses. Make sure you #ShopSmall today—I know I will!

With COVID-19 surging across America there has never been a more important time to make sure you #GetCovered with health insurance under the Affordable Care Act.   Go to https://t.co/wM43rjghRC by December 15 to find a plan that fits your needs.

Wishing Illinoisans and Americans across the country a Happy Thanksgiving! I know this year’s celebrations look different but together we will make it through this crisis and come out on the other side stronger because of it. https://t.co/6Oz8nHrbqO

The President should use the pardon power to redress manifest injustices not shamelessly cover up the corruption that touched the core of this Administration. I hope President-elect Biden will use clemency to help right the wrongs of our misguided “war on drugs.” https://t.co/NbwSJP0xiY

The Senate Judiciary Committee has become a shell of its former self under a Republican majority. But under Democratic leadership my colleagues and I would get to work on undoing the damage of the last four years and protecting fundamental civil and human rights. https://t.co/nGHMZ8TTFE

The 2021 open enrollment period ends on December 15. COVID-19 has underscored the importance of health coverage. NOW is the time to find the plan that fits your needs. Go to https://t.co/wM43rjghRC and shop around—premiums are lower and there are more options to choose from.

As we give thanks this year we owe a special debt of gratitude to our heroic health care workers who are facing another surge in COVID-19 cases. Please help to protect them by heeding public health guidance wearing a mask & distancing.

There are other numbers President Trump should be concerned about right now. Like the 257000+ Americans dead 20.3M claiming unemployment and more than 1 million new #COVID19 cases in the past week alone. https://t.co/k0g5Nb6B10

Glad to see @GSAEmily finally did the right thing. A smooth transition of power is essential to our democracy and no amount of huffing and puffing from the President is going to change the overwhelming results of this election. https://t.co/TtTFljlYIp

Excited that my Floor Director Reema Dodin will be joining President-elect Biden's Leg Affairs team. She is smart trusted & has the respect of members on both sides of the aisle. Reema is just what our new President needs to help him in the Senate. https://t.co/MTvm7M7jxd
Read my full statement here: https://t.co/sXhbJLezvF

I intend to seek the top Democratic position on the Judiciary Committee in the 117th Congress. We have to roll up our sleeves and get to work on undoing the damage of the last four years and protecting fundamental civil and human rights.

I want to thank @SenFeinstein for her distinguished leadership on the Judiciary Committee during turbulent years. She has been a champion for common-sense gun safety reproductive rights and many other issues of critical importance to the American people.

Congrats to @AliMayorkas a talented & experienced leader who will be the 1st immigrant & Latino to serve as DHS Secretary. We worked closely together on #DACA & I look forward to working with him to undo the damage done by the most anti-immigrant Administration in U.S. history.

President-elect Biden has put forward a team of experienced and tested leaders in foreign policy and national security. They will be ready to lead and help restore America’s standing in the world on day one.

Illinoisans—COVID-19 is surging across our state. Please take guidance from public health officials seriously wear your mask and make sure to social distance. We all need to work together to stop the spread of this virus.
If you never received the $1200 CARES Act Economic Impact Payment TODAY is the deadline to file to receive that payment. Find out if you are eligible here: https://t.co/p3axbSlgT9

Congratulation to Chicago’s own @sahloul for winning the 2020 Gandhi Peace Award for his work in Syria with @MedGlobal. Dr. Sahloul has never ceased in his commitment to helping others and I cannot think of anyone more deserving of this prestigious honor.

Joe Biden won this election by at least as wide a margin as Donald Trump did in 2016.   I'm joining @SenDuckworth @SenGaryPeters & @SenateDems in calling for @GSAEmily to do her job so the transition process can move forward.

On this #TransDayOfRemembrance we honor all of the transgender and gender-nonconforming Americans whose lives were stolen by transphobic violence. I will continue doing everything I can to make this country—and its laws—more equal and accepting of every American.

Rudy Giuliani is a legal buffoon but the racist strategy of trying to overturn the votes of African-Americans is no laughing matter. The outgoing President’s Republican enablers need to condemn this travesty and recognize President-elect Biden and Vice President-elect Harris now. https://t.co/KglhSNPLDO

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend and the next President of the United States @JoeBiden. I’m excited to get to work with the incoming Biden-Harris Administration on all of the important issues facing America today. https://t.co/FoS926duBA

Black women in IL are 6x more likely to die from pregnancy complications. We must address these unconscionable racial disparities in health care. One way is by passing my MOMMA Act—which would extend this short 60 day coverage window to a full year. https://t.co/h1k6yZqiLe

GSA Admin. @GSAEmily needs to do her job & allow the Biden transition to begin. The whole nation is going to pay for her failure if she does not act soon. It’s time for this public servant to put country over party. https://t.co/RJmb8WLlGy

The deteriorating political & humanitarian situation in Ethiopia must be addressed. I'm joining @ChrisVanHollen & @SenateDems in calling on Sec. Pompeo to directly engage with Ethiopian PM Abiy & continue pressing both sides for an immediate ceasefire. https://t.co/8rhrmLNe2v
I’ll be joining @mitchellreports on @MSNBC soon to discuss COVID-19 relief negotiations and the Biden transition. Make sure you tune in.

Spoke w/ @NEAToday Pres. @BeckyPringle yesterday about COVID-19 relief for schools. Congress needs to end the partisanship & come together to pass a relief bill that gives schools the funding they need to keep teachers & students safe. I'll keep working to make sure that happens.

Illinoisans— the deadline to receive stimulus checks is fast approaching. If you have not received your Economic Impact Payment you must file a form before November 21 to receive your payment. Find out if you are eligible here: https://t.co/p3axbSlgT9

COVID-19 is surging across IL to our worst levels yet.   Illinoisans—please do everything you can to stop the spread of this virus. Take the warnings from our public health agencies seriously wear a mask and make sure to social distance. We all must work together to save lives. https://t.co/yIPhqyTyKO

Spoke today with Gen. Perna & Dr. Slaoui from Operation Warp Speed about the latest efforts to develop & distribute a safe & effective COVID-19 vaccine. I'll continue doing everything I can to support research efforts & ensure smooth equitable access once authorized by FDA.

President Trump’s denials weakness & erratic response to COVID-19 will go down as one of the worst failures in American history. 250000 Americans have died—a tragic loss of life—and he doesn’t even have time to spare a word of condolence. https://t.co/2PgzzKLV3B

Nothing President Trump can do will change the fact that he lost to President-elect Joe Biden by a historic margin of more than 5 million votes. He is embarrassing himself and our nation in his refusal to accept reality.   https://t.co/dC1nQAOS43

Even though Pres. Trump and his allies’ shameless attempts to overturn the election results will fail they could be laying the groundwork for the next wannabe authoritarian to do what this President cannot. https://t.co/qxmkUy55a1

Political prisoners Raif Badawi Waleed Abu al-Khair & others languish in Saudi prisons amid Pres. Trump’s indifference—even after the brutal murder of Jamal Khashoggi. Looking forward to incoming Biden Admin. reclaiming America’s voice on human rights. https://t.co/L10Yf2avIy

The Trump @USDA wants to end SNAP benefits & take food off the table for 8000 seniors in supportive living facilities—in the middle of a pandemic. @SenDuckworth @RepCheri @RodneyDavis & I are leading the IL delegation in opposing this cruel effort. https://t.co/GI5w12Pfn0

Withholding public health info during this pandemic is the height of irresponsibility & the American people are going to pay the price. https://t.co/3XUHgYJAtk
President Trump’s impulsive conduct — including a possible war with Iran not authorized by Congress — needs to be reined in during this lame duck period of his Presidency. https://t.co/vyCCXfvcOt

The President’s decision to draw down troop levels in Afghanistan and Iraq recklessly undermines American leverage amid ongoing peace talks and attempts to release American captives including Illinoisan Mark Frerichs.  My full statement: https://t.co/bqjjDyZuX3

It should go without saying that there are more timely & important questions to address. https://t.co/2aqgNNZ90U

COVID-19 is surging in every single state in America and Republicans are too busy trying to soothe the President’s sore ego to do anything about it. Well the election is over & Pres. Trump lost by more than 5 million votes—it’s time we get back to work for the American people. https://t.co/21ClG9vCfy
Will be joining @wolfblitzer on @CNNSitRoom shortly to discuss rising COVID-19 cases and the Republican response to President Trump’s refusal to concede. Make sure you tune in.
I’m speaking live on the Senate floor about the recent nationwide surge in COVID-19 infections & the urgent need for Congress to pass a meaningful relief bill. Watch here: https://t.co/DXtnkCDgzB

I commend FRA Admin. Batory for addressing this problem—Amtrak riders deserve assurance that they can arrive at their destination in a safe and timely manner. If implemented properly this new @USDOTFRA rule will improve Amtrak’s passenger rail service & efficiency greatly. https://t.co/NmH85C3RCd

Los latinos han jugado un papel importante en la formación de nuestra nación desde el principio y es hora de que escuchemos sus historias. Soy un orgulloso copatrocinador del proyecto de ley del @SenatorMenedez para establecer un @latinomuseum. #LatinoMuseumNOW

Latinos have played a major role in shaping our nation from the beginning and it’s time we hear their stories. I’m a proud cosponsor of @SenatorMenedez’s bill to establish a @latinomuseum. #LatinoMuseumNOW https://t.co/QScIX1OXoo

Proud to join @SenDuckworth & 23 of my @SenateDems colleagues in calling on Senator McConnell to provide relief to Temporary Protected Status (TPS) holders in the US. More than 130000 TPS holders are essential workers during this pandemic—we can’t afford to lose them. https://t.co/9oJoZY5alY

Facebook has revolutionized the way we communicate—but it has also been used to dehumanize & stoke violence against the Muslim community. Joining @ChrisCoons to call on Facebook to take immediate action to combat bigotry on its platform. https://t.co/VIeeKMvI4J

Hate crimes are on the rise across the United States. Republicans in Congress must do more to address this growing crisis. We're facing a health workforce crisis as our doctors & nurses grapple w/ this unrelenting pandemic. @marcorubio & I have a bill to address these health care shortages—but we need Sen. McConnell to finally join Dems to negotiate a bipartisan relief deal. https://t.co/mi9Vzmp67j

We have reached the gravest moment of this pandemic. We need to help w/ unemployment relief small business & restaurant relief aid to state & local govts more testing a helping hand to families and logistical help for vaccine distro.   The Senate must pass COVID relief NOW.

.@CarolMarin has made countless contributions to journalism and the people of Chicago throughout her award-winning career. Though she will be deeply missed I wish Carol the best in this well-deserved retirement. https://t.co/lbB9goa5Tc
My thoughts and prayers are with Sgt. Jeremy Cain and his family as they mourn his tragic loss. https://t.co/u7m9G7j9bZ

Congratulations to Illinois' own Sydney Barber who will become the first Black female brigade commander in the history of the U.S Naval Academy. Keep making Illinois proud Midshipman Barber! https://t.co/2W6u4iYygZ

Kim Ng and the @Marlins made history this week and it was about time. I look forward to rooting for Kim during her groundbreaking first season—as long as her Marlins are not playing my @Cubs! https://t.co/mjWVlEZLhY
Wishing a happy #Diwali to everyone celebrating today! May your day be full of happiness peace and light.

Thanks to @IL_Insurance & @cchcc1977 for joining me virtually today to encourage Illinoisans in need of health insurance to enroll before the Dec. 15 deadline. The ACA is a lifeline for thousands of Illinoisans including families like Kate’s who shared her story with us today: https://t.co/Ps3ubKpyQ0

Sen. McConnell needs to face reality and work with Democrats to pass comprehensive COVID-19 relief. Infections & hospitalizations are skyrocketing across the country—we can’t afford to keep waiting on health & economic assistance any longer. https://t.co/mLGDt3UazU

Today @RepPressley @SenatorLeahy @SenBooker & I are calling on AG Barr to suspend all federal executions so the incoming Biden-Harris Admin. can evaluate—and hopefully end—the use of the federal death penalty. It is discriminatory immoral & ineffective.  Read our letter here: https://t.co/6XEujgBOUB

Spoke today with @SecAFOfficial about potential PFAS levels near Peoria and Springfield National Guard bases. We must do everything we can to detect and remediate PFAS chemicals so we can protect our servicemembers their families and the surrounding communities.
Will be joining @chucktodd on @MSNBC soon to discuss President-elect Biden's transition process and the surge in COVID-19 cases across the US. Make sure to tune in.

The Trump Administration is actively threatening public health by rolling back protections on toxic waste from coal plants. https://t.co/D9VX8IZFK2

Will be joining @CNNnewsroom soon to discuss President-elect Biden's transition as well as the surging cases of COVID-19 across the country & how the Senate must act. Make sure you tune in.

My thoughts & prayers go out to the lives lost due to #COVID19 at LaSalle Veterans Home which is grappling with a significant outbreak. My office is in contact w/ the Gov’s office and is ready to help in any way possible. Praying for a quick recovery for the residents & staff. https://t.co/EWyvA5vTjZ
Need health insurance for next year?   The open enrollment period to buy a 2021 health plan is open now. Find the option that fits you best at https://t.co/wM43rjghRC.

To all our vets in Illinois & across America—thank you for your service to our country. I know Veterans Day celebrations look different this year but our devotion during this pandemic to our vets is undiminished. A special salute to my big brothers Bill & Bob USN-Korean War. https://t.co/Fn8Em6d013

AG Barr is clearly attempting to fabricate a veneer of legitimacy for the baseless claims of voter fraud made by President Trump and his supporters. If we don't act the ongoing climate crisis is only going to inflict further harm on Native communities. It is our duty as leaders lawmakers and Americans to ensure that our Native American communities and their heritage are preserved for centuries to come.

November is National Native American Heritage month a time to honor the history & contributions of Native people in the US. But we cannot do so without committing to environmental justice for Native communities—who are disproportionally harmed by air & water pollution.

History will judge us on how we respond—or don't—to the worst health crisis in a century & deepest recession in 75 years. It's time for Senate Republicans to end their boycott of negotiations & actually work with Dems to respond to the toll this pandemic is taking on our nation. https://t.co/7vKZCn2v0v

I am honored to be re-elected as Whip of the Senate Dem Caucus. The Nov 3 election showed that our nation is divided & the challenges we face are great. But under the leadership of President-elect Biden & VP-elect Harris we can & must come together to meet those challenges.

The Republican lawsuit to eliminate the Affordable Care Act goes before the Supreme Court today.   Protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions are at stake in this case. Health care coverage for millions is at stake. Lives are at stake.

The Affordable Care Act goes before the Supreme Court including newly confirmed Justice Barrett tomorrow. If Republicans succeed in eliminating the ACA millions could lose access to health care—in the middle of a pandemic. Lives are at stake in this case.
Thanks President George W. Bush for your gracious message to President-elect Biden. https://t.co/idYwcRWZ8a
Speaking on the Senate floor now about President-elect Joe Biden’s victory in last week’s election and our path forward in the fight against #COVID19: https://t.co/iRH2k7NcGw

President-elect Biden’s #COVID19 task force is solid. I have worked with many over the years. They are respected professionals truth tellers and real leaders. America can turn the corner on this pandemic if we pull together. https://t.co/T8yKTBIhEq

Today’s #COVID19 vaccine development offers hope to a nation longing to put this pandemic behind it. But now we need to carefully follow established medical standards to prove safety & efficacy so that America trusts the process & the product. https://t.co/8U4muE0U9l
Good news for future generations: Biden’s victory means that America is once again joining the world in the fight against climate change.

President-elect Biden’s victory will be a victory for #Dreamers who can come out of the shadows and fear of the Trump era.   Thousands of #Dreamers want to be part of America’s future. Thank you @JoeBiden for giving them a chance by pledging to restore #DACA. https://t.co/1XxtIVCBRL
Our family zoom yesterday brought generations together from West Coast to East Coast. We usually save these good feelings for weddings. But on Saturday we all felt good for the country we love.
Thanks @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris for the best Saturday in a long time. Even the masks could not hide a smiling nation! https://t.co/pNBNdEQr1A
Congratulations to my colleague Vice President-elect @SenKamalaHarris! Her historic election shows girls women and people of color across this country that your future is limitless.
The national nightmare of President Donald J. Trump ends in eleven weeks. President-elect Biden and all of us have work to do to undo the damage and bind our nation’s wounds.

This is a devastating milestone for Illinois in our fight against COVID-19. Please continue to protect our communities by distancing & wearing a mask. It is past time for Congress to come together and pass meaningful bipartisan COVID-19 relief. https://t.co/i9L13AEaNL

No President decides the outcome of an election. The courts do not decide the outcome of an election. It is the voters who decide the outcome of an election and every single one of their ballots must be counted. #Election2020

#ElectionDay is right around the corner. It’s vitally important that every vote is counted and every voice is heard.   Make sure you have a voting plan by going to https://t.co/WMraiH5Ugb today.

If McConnell’s Senate can process a lifetime appointment to the highest court in the land in a matter of days there is no excuse for his failure to negotiate with Democrats to pass a relief bill that could’ve extended our businesses & workers a helping hand in this time of need.

For months small businesses & nonprofits in Illinois have been desperate for federal assistance to survive this pandemic. Despite pleas for help Majority Leader McConnell & Senate Republicans plugged their ears & fast-tracked a Supreme Court nomination.

.@SenDuckworth & I have blocked USDA’s overreach for 2 years. Now—in the middle of a pandemic—they're trying again. This time USDA seems to be breaking commitments made to me in Congressional testimony. We will stand up again to this senseless effort & protect these Illinoisans.

IL runs a leading program to help 8000 seniors & people w/disabilities access health & nutrition services in their community rather than an institutional setting. Despite two decades of this program the Trump Admin has tried to rip away SNAP benefits that feed these groups.

The ACA protects millions of Americans with pre-existing conditions. But Republicans want SCOTUS to strike it down & rushed a new justice to the Court to help. We can't return to dark days of higher costs & less care for sick patients. I’ll keep fighting to save the ACA.
President Trump wants to turn Voice of America into his own state-run propaganda machine like other autocrats he admires. https://t.co/wsERHT6KyT

Spoke earlier this week with @IDPH Director Dr. Ezike about the surge of COVID-19 cases in IL racial disparities and our PPE & testing capacity. I promised Dr. Ezike to keep urging my Republican colleagues to finally join Democrats in crafting a comprehensive relief package.

As COVID-19 cases in IL surge to record levels it is straining our health care system. I was briefed by hospital officials from Chicago to Carbondale & Quincy to Danville about PPE & testing needs & to let them know I am doing everything I can to bring federal aid home to IL.

From the outset the President and his team misled the public downplayed the virus & refused to follow the science. The consequence? 74000 new COVID-19 cases yesterday alone. Hospital beds filling up. 226000+ Americans are dead. They have not “ended the pandemic” in any sense. https://t.co/jd3NDMRCKl

These kinds of corporate bankruptcy abuses are unacceptable. Congress must pass my Protecting Employees and Retirees in Business Bankruptcies Act to help put workers’ interests before those of corporate executives when businesses file for Chapter 11. https://t.co/WZBeyPLRga

From start to finish Republicans disregarded the COVID-19 pandemic in their rush to confirm Judge Barrett before Election Day. All the while #COVID19 cases spiked across the US.   They gave up on helping the American people to pursue a partisan power grab. Shameful.

Justice Amy Coney Barrett’s walk through the White House with President Trump was a campaign ad. Republicans want the Supreme Court to strike down the ACA and tilt the election their way. It was a sad day for the Court and our country but we will fight tooth and nail.

Now that she has been sworn in litigants in the PA mail-in ballot case have rightly pointed out that Justice Barrett’s “impartiality might reasonably be questioned” and have asked for her to recuse. She should do so immediately.

Pres. Trump has been clear that he wanted Justice Barrett on the Court to help him in election challenges. Democrats asked Justice Barrett at her hearing to commit to recuse herself from cases involving the ongoing election and she refused. This left a cloud over her nomination. https://t.co/E6x87zvam0
Originalism is the MAGA of judicial philosophies. We cannot allow an 18th century understanding of the Constitution to dictate what happens in 21st century America.

Sen. McConnell spent 5 straight days on the Senate floor jamming through the Barrett nomination. Five days for a partisan power grab. But no time for meaningful bipartisan #COVID19 relief. His priorities are crystal clear.

Justice Kavanaugh & his conservative allies last night disenfranchised Wisconsin voters whose ballots are mailed before Election Day but arrive after. Voter suppression is alive and well in the GOP.   It’s clear that we must enact my Constitutional guarantee of a right to vote.

This is a dark day for the Senate. Republicans have defied rules & traditions in their rush to confirm Judge Barrett in the middle of a once-in-a-century pandemic & an election. I believe my Republican colleagues will regret the consequences of taking us down this path.

I will be voting against Judge Barrett’s nomination tonight. More than 225000 Americans have died from COVID-19 & more than 60 million ballots have already been cast in the election that is just eight days away. This is not the time to be pursuing partisan power grabs.

Adding Judge Barrett to form a 6-3 conservative Supreme Court is a direct threat to Americans’ access to affordable health care voting rights reproductive rights marriage equality & more. I will vote no on her nomination because I know #WhatsAtStake.

In Citizens United conservatives struck down a campaign finance law to unleash a flood of dark money. In Shelby County conservatives gutted the Voting Rights Act unleashing a wave of voter suppression. Now another originalist-textualist has been nominated to undo the ACA.

FACT CHECK: Republicans claim Judge Barrett will be a neutral umpire & Democrats want courts to be “super-legislatures” with unelected judges making laws. In fact right-wing judicial activists have repeatedly used originalism & textualism to overturn duly-enacted laws.

225000+ Americans are dead & Trump Admin has surrendered to COVID-19. The GOP-held Senate refuses to work with Democrats on relief.  All of their focus is on the Supreme Court. They've decided this power grab is more important than helping American people during a pandemic.

For the sake of public health Vice President Pence should stay home today. The White House has already hosted one super-spreader event in the past month—we shouldn’t risk him creating another in the Senate. https://t.co/pmeAdgB8qs
Congratulations to Chicago native and former Belleville Bishop Wilton Gregory on his being chosen as a new Cardinal in the Catholic Church. The Pope made an excellent choice. https://t.co/OmQyRtkpei

In their rush to confirm Judge Barrett & eliminate health care Rs have abandoned needs of Americans during this pandemic. https://t.co/ZZJC5RkwQL
